episodes.title: How I Escaped The Children of God Cult | People Are Deep | True Crime Fix
episodes.description:
In this episode we talked to Petra Velzeboer, who grew up in a religious cult The Children Of God (now known as The Family International). Petra told us how she left the cult, how her trauma led to addiction and wanting to take her life, and how she managed to find healing and recovery.

Documentary: People Are Deep | S1E07 | How I Escaped A Dangerous Cult
